title: Enhancing Elementary Mathematics Instructional Design Competencies Through AI-Enabled Collaborative Thinking Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic math instructional design experience and fundamental digital tool usage skills
context.additional_context: In-service elementary teachers conduct projects to improve mathematics instructional design using AI tools. Team activities based on personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Participants can apply collaborative assessment and metacognitive strategies in math instructional design tasks using ChatGPT with over 80% participation.
Participants can enhance task understanding and content monitoring skills in math lesson design by combining the Six Thinking Hats strategy with AI tools.
Participants can complete team-based mathematics instructional design projects using the PBL approach and submit final deliverables reflecting AI-enhanced collaborative processes.

resources: Access to ChatGPT Plus or educational API
Math instructional design PBL guide document
Collaborative platform (e.g., Google Workspace) access environment

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
